name: memorable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 likely to be remembered or worth remembering: a memorable performance a memorable tune I haven't seen them since that memorable evening when the boat capsized.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was no dishonour to finish out of the medals in the most memorable 100 metres race ever seen.The lavish production makes this musical truly memorable.On this memorable occasion we salute the wonderful work done by the association.
